function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of google search query data as proxy indicators may not fully capture outdoor recreational intention.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on strava data as a representation of recreational activity may not capture the full spectrum of users, potentially skewing the results.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of relative estimates into absolute activity numbers may introduce errors due to calibration and sampling limitations.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Detrending the time series data to account for the long-term trend in strava data may oversimplify the analysis and mask important variations in activity patterns.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shifting political divide in addressing the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Politics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid changes in people’s behavior and attitudes","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the impact of political views on compliance","category":"Politics","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to authority and measures","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Political orientation not a predictor of compliance","category":"Politics","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Backlash against authorities leading to resistance to compliance","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of social norm on compliance behavior","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential decline in compliant behavior over time","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short-term compliance due to low impact of costs and negative emotions","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Individual differences in compliance based on impulsiveness","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving minimum certainty of punishment for violating covid-19 measures","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed results in the relationship between moral support for measures and compliant behavior","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of personal costs not influencing compliance","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Negative emotions increasing compliance with stay-at-home measures","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People meeting with friends and relatives outside of their direct household","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in covid-19 measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political orientation not associated with compliance","category":"Politics","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived clarity of covid-19 measures may be low, leading to confusion and potential non-adherence to the guidelines.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor correlation of one item in relation to the others may affect the overall accuracy of the findings.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential influence of political orientation on compliance with pandemic measures","category":"Politics","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Echo chambers reinforcing particular political orientations and influencing views on pandemic measures","category":"Politics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of fear of authorities on compliance with pandemic measures","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for non-compliance with rules and requests","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher impulsivity predicting non-compliance","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of social norms on compliance","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative emotions leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived capacity and knowledge affecting compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concordance between self-report and objective compliance measures differs based on the method of assessment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in compliance may be influenced by substantive moral support for measures and perception of costs and strain","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of moral appeals for compliance","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on de-identified cell-phone data to assess compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing measures not being followed","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay-at-home orders","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of the pandemic on different social groups due to differences in living conditions and access to resources.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased mental health issues due to social isolation, post-traumatic stress for health workers, and economic fallout.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed environmental effects of the pandemic, including improvements in air quality and reduction of pollution due to decreased travel, but also potential negative consequences for wildlife and ecological balance.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chronic under-funding of the world health organization who leading to limited resources for global health governance.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakening of multilateral institutions, including the who, by influential developed countries.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak public health systems unable to manage population-wide approaches","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weaknesses and disparities in healthcare systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
